meanings.sent1: The rabbit was fleeing from the fox.
meanings.sent2: She was caught fleeing from the scene of the crime.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was fleeing so fast, it almost looked like it was flying!
meanings.sent4: The students were fleeing the classroom like a stampede of wild horses.
meanings.sent5: The sound of gunfire sent everyone fleeing in panic.

meanings.definition: To escape from danger or pursuit
meanings.sent1: The hiker was fleeing from the approaching storm.
meanings.sent2: The thief was caught fleeing with the stolen goods.
meanings.sent3: The cat was fleeing from the vacuum cleaner like it was a monster!
meanings.sent4: The idea of failure had him fleeing from the challenge like a deer from a hunter.
meanings.sent5: The hero was seen fleeing the burning building with the rescued kitten in hand.
